content: Ci possono essere ladri, falsari, pervertiti o assassini nei social network. Per la propria sicurezza, non si dovrebbe credere loro.
translations: eng:There may be thieves, fakers, perverts or killers in social networks. For your security, you shouldn't believe them
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
